seo.description: Stop guessing which meeting format to use. Whether it's a brainstorming session, a sales call, or a solo thought process, 'Flexible' mode adapts instantly to organize your chaos into crystal-clear logic.
seo.ogTitle: One Format to Rule Them All: Meet Flexible Mode
seo.ogDescription: Chaos in, structure out. Discover why the 'Flexible' format is the smartest way to record meetings, interviews, and ideas.

ld.headline: The 'Flexible' Format: Perfect Minutes, Zero Setup
ld.description: An in-depth look at Minutes.AI's most versatile recording mode that adapts to any context.

hero.h1: The Only Format You Really Need: Meet "Flexible"
hero.tagline: General, Sales, Interview, Presentation... tired of choosing? We built 'Flexible' to end the decision fatigue. It adapts to your conversation in real-time, turning any discussion into a masterpiece of logic.
hero.subtag: From chaotic brainstorms to structured interviews, Flexible captures the essence without you lifting a finger.

problem.p1: Minutes.AI offers specialized formats like 'Sales', 'Lecture', and '1-on-1'. They are powerful, but sometimes life doesn't fit into a neat box.
problem.p2: Have you ever hesitated before hitting record? "Is this a meeting or just a chat?" "It's kind of a lecture but also a brainstorm..." Choosing the 'General' format often feels like a compromise that might result in a vague summary.
problem.quote: "I just want it to work without thinking about settings."

solution.p1: This is why we created **Flexible**. It is our smartest, most adaptive algorithm yet.
solution.p2: It doesn't assume the structure beforehand; it discovers it. Whether you are rambling to yourself to organize thoughts or arguing in a 5-person strategy meeting, Flexible detects the context and organizes the output logically.
highlights: **Context Detection**: Automatically identifies if it's a dialogue, a monologue, or a debate.
**Smart Extraction**: Pulls out action items and decisions even from messy conversations.
**Logical Flow**: Reorders scattered points into a coherent narrative.

scenarios.note: See how 'Flexible' handles completely different scenarios seamlessly.

items.title: Solo Brain Dumping
items.desc: Walking and talking to yourself? Flexible treats it like a structured memo, grouping your scattered ideas into clear headers.

items.title: Hybrid Meetings
items.desc: Starts as a 'Check-in', turns into a 'Brainstorm', ends with 'Sales strategy'? Flexible tracks the shift and formats accordingly.

items.title: Complex Interviews
items.desc: Q&A sessions where topics jump around? Flexible regroups answers by topic, not just chronologically.

cta.text: Don't just take our word for it. Open Minutes.AI, select 'Flexible', and start talking. Experience the magic of having your thoughts organized by a pro.
